title: How to Become a DIY Drip Irrigation: Affordable and Easy Expert

subtasks: Connect garden hose to water source
Attach timer to the garden hose
Connect pressure regulator to the timer
Connect backflow preventer to the pressure regulator
Install filter downstream of backflow preventer
Lay out tubing and secure with stakes
Punch holes in tubing for emitters
Attach emitters to holes in tubing
Adjust emitters based on plant needs
Turn on system and check for leaks
